subdisciplines.name: Computer Organization
subdisciplines.description: The study of the internal organization of digital computers, especially the interaction between hardware and software, and its effect on computer performance.

subdisciplines.name: Microarchitecture
subdisciplines.description: The study of the organization of the data paths, functional units and the memory hierarchy of a computer system.

subdisciplines.name: Instruction Set Architecture
subdisciplines.description: The study of the definition of machine language commands and how they are executed and implemented in hardware.
